about_me_paragraph1: Passionate about creating modern and intuitive web experiences. I create exceptional digital experiences with modern technologies. I focus on creating responsive, user-friendly, and visually appealing applications.
about_me_paragraph2: I'm a passionate developer with expertise in React, Tailwind CSS, and modern web technologies. I love building visually appealing and functional interfaces that deliver intuitive and aesthetic user experiences with careful attention to detail.

abouts.title: About Me
abouts.description: Learn more about my background, experience, and what drives me as a developer.
abouts.introduction: I develop responsive web applications for an optimal experience on all devices. My passion for new technologies and my attention to detail allow me to create exceptional user experiences. I am constantly monitoring technology to adopt the best practices and tools on the market.
abouts.approach: My approach to development combines technical excellence with creative problem-solving. I believe that great software should not only function without defects but also surprise users with thoughtful interactions and visually appealing interfaces.
abouts.approach2: When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or sharing my knowledge with the developer community.
abouts.values2: I believe in creating software that is not only functional but also accessible, inclusive, and centered on the user. My core values include:
abouts.interests5: Reading books on technology and design
abouts.slide1: I have visited more than 20 countries
abouts.slide2: I can solve a Rubik's cube in less than 2 minutes
abouts.slide3: I am a certified coffee connoisseur
abouts.slide4: I have coded for 24 hours straight
abouts.slide5: I like to watch stars and astronomy photography
abouts.description0: Specialized in web development and user interface design, focusing on modern JavaScript frameworks and reactive design principles.
abouts.description1: Programme intensif couvrant React, state management, performance optimization and modern CSS frameworks.
abouts.description2: Developing and maintaining client-side websites using React, Next.js and Tailwind CSS. Collaborating with designers and backend developers to create fluid user experiences..
abouts.description3: Building responsive websites and implementing UI components for various client projects. Working with JavaScript, HTML5 and CSS3.
abouts.description4: Assistance in web application development and practical experience with modern web technologies.

projects1.title: My Projects
projects1.description: Here are some of the recent projects I've worked on. For more projects, check out my GitHub profile.

projects1.description4: A social media dashboard application for planning posts, analyzing engagement, and managing multiple accounts.
projects1.description5: A recipe search application with ingredient filtering, dietary restrictions, and cooking time filtering.
projects1.description6: A portfolio website showcasing my projects, skills, and experience with smooth animations and interactive features.

contact1.description2: I am always open to new opportunities and interesting projects. Don't hesitate to contact me to discuss your project or just say hello!
